message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to kick things off.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. I think a 55/45 split is reasonable this time.
Bob, it seems like we both want a larger share. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer recognizes the time pressure we're both under.
Time is running out, Alice.  I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to end this now.  51/49 is my final offer.
